game.name: Cooking Challenge
game.description:
These two lovely princesses have passionately decided to participate in a leading cooking contest and they need your help in preparing the delicious donuts. Common girls! Your professional guidance can help prepare the best donuts and make their day. Join Cooking Challenge and be prepared to decorate the donuts and do everything required to make them look delicious! It is up to you how wisely you prepare your donuts to help your favorite princess win the prize in this brand new girls game.

Grab your favorite candies, chocolate and sweet syrups to make your donuts good-looking! Remember you have to create the perfect donut for each princess. Guide them to choose the nice color of the dough first and then work on adding a lovely topping! Make sure to decorate it with some swirls of chocolate between dark and white. Do not forget to add some colorful sprinkles to the donut in this HTML5 cooking game. Use nuts, caramel or candy as per your needs.

A centerpiece will definitely help to make your donuts extra special. It can be some candy or a mint sprig, a slice or orange, or a swirl of whipped cream with a fruit on top. Wow! Your scrumptious donuts are ready to be served now. Serve it with a drink and another treat like a cheesecake or a burger! Wait now to see who is the actually winner of this amazing cooking challenge! We cover a wide array of free cooking games that are playable on multiple devices like PCs, mobile phones and tablets.
